name: The Tale of George and Sir Galahad
name_original: The Tale of George and Sir Galahad
description:
The Tale of George and Sir Galahad is a short piece of interactive fiction I wrote and iterated on using feedback from a six-week workshop. I wanted to challenge myself to write a dialogue-heavy story with a whimsical air like Arthurian legends.

Image from Dave Robinson on Unsplash.
